data.persona: I am the fox of the brook in the forest. I live near the castle in the shrubs. I steal from wanderers.
data.description:
You are in the Dead Valley.
The desert is a dry span of hot sand.  The dunes rise and fall silently.  There is a large rock on which an iguana suns itself.  Cactus plants are scattered sparsely through the land.
There's a fine merchant clothing here.

You are carrying some clothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to line my den with fine material
data.mid_motivation: I want to attract a she-fox
data.long_motivation: I want to have a litter a foxes to raise as my own

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go to the top of a sand dune

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: put my nose on the wind

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow a merchant traveling through the desert

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put fine clothing on the den
